I must be offensive to the French, to mark a point in a debate! #BFMTV
I want to give priority to employment, in a very difficult context, but where there is room for action. #BFMTV
Why do you think I put so much strength in my desire to renegotiate the European treaty? #BFMTV # FH2012
A parade on May 1st is a parade of labor organizations! #BFMTV # FH2012
Unlike N. Sarkozy, I do not seat the extreme right. #BFMTV # FH2012
Promise, yes. Compromise me, no. #BFMTV # FH2012
There are not too many legal immigrants in France. #BFMTV # FH2012
There are too many illegal immigrants in France. #BFMTV # FH2012
The criteria of regularization will be the same for all, there will be more arbitrary. #BFMTV # FH2012
I forwarded to all European partners my proposals for boosting growth in Europe. There is no pre-agreement. #BFMTV
It is on my project that the government will be formed. #BFMTV # FH2012
Why was the most expensive formula chosen to support states in difficulty? #Europe #BFMTV # FH2012
The central bank can lend directly to the states, or we will allow the European solidarity mechanism to be backed by the ECB.
I think what I've been doing for a year is clarity, consistency and consistency. I do not change. #BFMTV # FH2012
In a presidential campaign, no image should be confusing. #BFMTV # FH2012
I'll be Sunday night in Tulle, then I'll go back to Paris. #BFMTV # FH2012
There will be work from May 7th, but I do not know what the result will be, I'm building it. #BFMTV # FH2012
I will answer in a few moments the questions of the listeners of RMC. #BFMTV # FH2012
I trust the nuclear safety authority. #BFMTV # FH2012
Housing is both an economic activity, an element of growth and meets a need for the French. #BFMTV
Upon my election, state lands will immediately be made available to local communities to build. #BFMTV
The ceiling of the livret A will be doubled which will enable it to collect 20 billion euros for the construction of social housing. #BFMTV
1 million euros is a very important income! #BFMTV
How can important leaders pay for themselves without fully participating in national solidarity? #BFMTV
I do not want to make taxation a spoliation, I want there to be justice. Everyone must lead by example. #BFMTV # FH2012
As for the legislative election, I consider that there must be a proportional share, introduced as of 2017. #BFMTV
I think 100 members should be elected by proportional representation. #BFMTV
If I'm not elected Sunday, I will not withdraw from politics. #BFMTV
I wish the right to vote for foreigners in municipal elections. #BFMTV
It is SMEs that make the cash of large companies, which is not acceptable. #BFMTV
The example must come from above. I will reduce salaries for the head of state and the government. #BFMTV
I want the pay gap in public companies to be between 1 and 20. #BFMTV
Today, 90% of estates are exempt, I will not question that. #BFMTV
We need hospitals as public services. #BFMTV
We must succeed in keeping our works of art in our country! #BFMTV
I will abolish the VAT increase decided by the current majority. #BFMTV
I will restore 12,000 jobs per year in the National Education. #BFMTV
I will reform the criminal status of the head of state. #BFMTV
I decided that the public accounts will be in equilibrium at the end of 2017. #BFMTV

Sunday, the French will choose their next President of the Republic. #VoteHollande
I must say tonight what president I will be, if the French give me their confidence. #VoteHollande
I will be the President of justice, I want justice to be at the heart of all public decisions #VoteHollande
I want to be the President of the recovery of France. #VoteHollande
I want to be the president of the rally. For too many years the French have been opposed, I want to reunite them. #VoteHollande
Trust is essential for public action. #VoteHollande
I want to come back to the rally. I think it's an essential notion. #VoteHollande
If you feel that for 5 years you have gathered the French, then I will give you discharge! #VoteHollande
You say "there was no violence". Fortunately! #VoteHollande
Mr. Sarkozy, you will have a hard time passing for a victim! #VoteHollande
I condemn all excesses. #VoteHollande
The biggest victims were the French. #VoteHollande
Unemployment has risen by one million, it's a record. #VoteHollande
I will create the generation contract: http://t.co/doCx8a0O #VoteHollande
On the numbers, I understand that it does not make you happy. #VoteHollande
There are 4 million people registered at Pôle emploi, it is indisputable. There were 3 million when you were elected.
You invent a new tax on the French to have an effect on very small companies. Go understand!
It's not you who ask the questions and you do not give notes in this exercise! #VoteHollande
With you, it's very simple: it's never your fault. You always have a scapegoat. #VoteHollande
Your foreign trade deficit is structural: it has been growing for five years each year. #VoteHollande
I am indeed from the Court of Auditors, please specify. My numbers are accurate. Everyone can testify. #VoteHollande
Whatever happens, whatever happens, you are happy! #VoteHollande
The price of gas has increased by 60% and electricity by 20%. #VoteHollande
The public debt has increased by 600 billion euros since the beginning of the five-year period of N. Sarkozy. #VoteHollande
Apart from the education budget, the country's first budget is interest on debt. #VoteHollande
We have an obligation: to balance our public accounts at the end of 2017. #VoteHollande
The tax loopholes will be capped at 10,000 euros. #VoteHollande
We will restore the wealth tax. #VoteHollande
You have distributed checks from the public treasury to the wealthy through the tax shield. #VoteHollande
What I recommend is that the most fortunate make checks to the public treasury! #VoteHollande
I protect children from the Republic. You, you protect the most privileged. It's your right. #VoteHollande
Public service staff will be stabilized and public spending will not increase by more than 1% per year. #VoteHollande
You increased the compulsory contributions under your five-year period by almost one and a half points. #VoteHollande
The primary school supervision rate is the lowest in the OECD. #School #VoteHollande
We have lost the attractiveness of kindergarten: only 10% of children under 3 go to school. #VoteHollande
The crisis in the euro zone has been open for 3 years. Many delays have been made and we are paying the consequences. #VoteHollande
There was no dimension of growth. We are imposing on countries a generalized austerity. #Europe #VoteHollande
We would be condemned forever to austerity. #Europe #VoteHollande
Without deficits shrinking since without growth, deficits can not be reduced. #Europe #VoteHollande
You did not create the financial transaction tax. You have reinstated the stock market tax that you had removed. #VoteHollande
You tell me that you know how to compromise? #VoteHollande
In this case compared to Germany, you did not get anything, you did not stand. #VoteHollande
My duty is to give another direction to Europe. #VoteHollande
Do not confuse your person with France! #VoteHollande
Economic immigration must be limited. We are in a period of unemployment and low growth. #VoteHollande
For foreign students, I found the circular Guéant regrettable. #VoteHollande
I consider that legal immigration must be mastered but we can not set criteria beyond reach. #VoteHollande
I do not change. #VoteHollande
I want people who pay local taxes to participate in municipal polls. #VoteHollande
What allows you to say that foreigners who are not European are Muslims? #VoteHollande
I voted for the resolution banning the burqa. #VoteHollande
The law on the burqa, if I become President of the Republic, will be strictly enforced. #VoteHollande
I try to be consistent in my convictions. #VoteHollande
We will close a nuclear power plant, the oldest in France: the Fessenheim power station. #VoteHollande
Are we doing work on old plants or are we investing in renewable energy? I made my choice.
I want to be a President who respects the French, who considers them. #VoteHollande
I will not name anyone unless the parliamentary committees decide by a two-thirds majority for. #VoteHollande
I will renounce the criminal statute of the Head of State. For all acts committed previously, there will be no more protection. #VoteHollande
The Superior Council of the Judiciary will appoint the magistrates of the seat and the public prosecutor's office. #VoteHollande
I consider it necessary to withdraw our fighting troops from Afghanistan before the end of 2012. #VoteHollande
I consider that our mission in Afghanistan is complete. There is no reason to maintain our troops beyond 2012. #VoteHollande
This debate was useful, it showed differences on economic, social, fiscal policies. #VoteHollande
We do not have the same project. #VoteHollande
The balance of Nicolas Sarkozy has been described as especially heavy. #VoteHollande
In 2007, facing @RoyalSegolene, Mr Sarkozy wanted to be judged on his results. Everyone will judge. #VoteHollande
I want to change my policy, my method. #VoteHollande
I want a change of direction on the European level. #VoteHollande
The choice is simple: do the French want to continue or change? #VoteHollande
I want Education to be the top priority because it is for youth that I want to embark on the next five years. #VoteHollande
I want to be judged on the decisions I will make based on the test of justice. #VoteHollande
I hope that the French will regain confidence and hope. #VoteHollande
Dear friends, I will be tomorrow morning the guest of the 4 truths on France 2 from 7:45 then on France Inter at 8:20! # FH2012
